Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Swiss_Prot Entry P85095]Cytotoxic to cancer cells, acts via the activation of the lysosomal-mitochondrial death pathway and autophagy-like cell death
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.18494941]2.5% hemolytic activity at 200 Î¼g/ml against sheep erythrocytes
Sequence Information.Function: Cytotoxicity towards malignant cells, including Jurkat (T-cell leukemia), BJAB (B-cell lymphoma), HT29/219, SW742 (colon carcinomas), L929 (fibrosarcoma), MCF-7 (breast adenocarcinoma), A549 (lung carcinoma), acts via the activation of the lysosomal-mitochondrial death pathway and autophagy-like cell death. Does not show significant hemolytic activity. Tissue specificity

Literature.Title: Brevinin-2R(1) semi-selectively kills cancer cells by a distinct mechanism, which involves the lysosomal-mitochondrial death pathway.
Literature.Author: Ghavami S, Asoodeh A, Klonisch T, Halayko AJ, Kadkhoda K, Kroczak TJ, Gibson SB, Booy EP, Naderi-Manesh H, Los M.

Literature.Title: Brevinin-2R semi-selectively kills cancer cells by a distinct mechanism, which involves the lysosomal-mitochondrial death pathway.
Literature.Author: Kadkhoda K.,Halayko A.J.,Klonisch T.,Asoodeh A.,Ghavami S.
